subject: Order status - inquiry
description_text:
Hello,

I am writing to inquire about the status of my order. I placed the order on
the evening of the 11th, and it has remained in the “confirmed” status
since then. As I paid for express shipping, I expected the processing to
move a bit faster.

Additionally, as I live in the EU, I would like to ask whether my order
will incur any additional delivery fees, such as taxes or customs charges.

My order number is #SSN4717.

Thank you for your assistance.
Kind regards,
Huňady

conversations.body_text: Hi Stanislav Huňady,    Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.
